title: I2C Component Definition
description: An I2C-based WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this sensor.

type.description: A unique string used to look up this sensor's definition, and its parent component's definition.

feedSuffix.description: A unique string used to create the feed name for this sub-component, e.g.'red' suffix and type='light' would give ws-001-light-red.

sensorType.description: One of the supported I2C sensor type strings (found in README).

defaultPeriod.description: What period to the form should default to for this sensor.

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

published.description: If true, this component is supported by the current firmware version and will be displayed to all users. If false, it is hidden behind a developer toggle so that contributors can still work on it against the production site.

description.description: A brief description describing this component's capabilities.

vendor.description: Name of the company that makes this component.

i2cAddresses.description: List of I2C addresses (as hex string, like "0x38") this component can appear on.

subcomponents.description: List of sensors on this I2C component.

customProperties.description: A list of custom properties that this component supports.

name.description: The name and key of the custom property.

type.description: The type of the custom property.

description.description: A brief description of the custom property.

default.description: The default value of the custom property.

displayed.description: If true, this custom property will be displayed in the UI.

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this custom property.

displayOptions.description: Options or values for the custom property.
